siteMetadata.title: Youtube 热门
siteMetadata.author: Buzzing.cc
siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Youtube 上的全球热门视频

blogPost.excerpt: After running out of hairspray, a Louisiana woman coated her hair with Gorilla Glue spray, a strong adhesive normally used to bond materials like metal, wood and stone. Tessica Brown went viral on social media after explaining the sticky situation and the regret that followed. Brown spoke to Inside Edition about her struggle to try and remove it. She tried baby oil, cooking oil and olive oil to try and remove the glue, but nothing worked. So she sought medical treatment at her local emergency room in Louisiana, but couldn’t tolerate the burning of the acetone wipes they gave her.
blogPost.body: After running out of hairspray, a Louisiana woman coated her hair with Gorilla Glue spray, a strong adhesive normally used to bond materials like metal, wood and stone. Tessica Brown went viral on social media after explaining the sticky situation and the regret that followed. Brown spoke to Inside Edition about her struggle to try and remove it. She tried baby oil, cooking oil and olive oil to try and remove the glue, but nothing worked. So she sought medical treatment at her local emergency room in Louisiana, but couldn’t tolerate the burning of the acetone wipes they gave her.
blogPost.title: TikToker Who Used Gorilla Glue in Hair Says ER Couldn’t Help
blogPost.author: Inside Edition

localize.title: 在头发上使用大猩猩胶水的TikToker说急诊室帮不上忙。
localize.description: 在用完发胶后，路易斯安那州的一名女子用Gorilla Glue喷雾涂抹了她的头发，这是一种通常用于粘合金属、木材和石头等材料的强力粘合剂。Tessica Brown在解释了粘性情况和之后的遗憾后，在社交媒体上进行了病毒式传播。布朗向Inside Edition讲述了她努力尝试去除它的过程。她尝试了婴儿油、食用油和橄榄油来尝试去除胶水，但没有任何效果。于是她在路易斯安那州当地的急诊室寻求治疗，但无法忍受他们给她的丙酮湿巾的燃烧。

localize.title: 在頭髮上使用大猩猩膠水的TikToker說急診室幫不上忙。
localize.description: 在用完髮膠後，路易斯安那州的一名女子用Gorilla Glue噴霧塗抹了她的頭髮，這是一種通常用於粘合金屬、木材和石頭等材料的強力粘合劑。Tessica Brown在解釋了粘性情況和之後的遺憾後，在社交媒體上進行了病毒式傳播。布朗向Inside Edition講述了她努力嘗試去除它的過程。她嘗試了嬰兒油、食用油和橄欖油來嘗試去除膠水，但沒有任何效果。於是她在路易斯安那州當地的急診室尋求治療，但無法忍受他們給她的丙酮溼巾的燃燒。

previous.excerpt:
Tessica Brown is now looking into suing the adhesive company alleging that the labels on their products are misleading. 

MORE: https://bit.ly/3cXRvCS
previous.title: Woman who went viral for using Gorilla Glue in hair may sue company; Her  legal options

localize.title: 女子因在头发上使用Gorilla胶水而走红，可能会起诉该公司；她的法律选择。
localize.description:
泰西卡-布朗现在正在研究起诉胶粘剂公司，指控其产品的标签具有误导性。

更多：https://bit.ly/3cXRvCS

localize.title: 女子因在頭髮上使用Gorilla膠水而走紅，可能會起訴該公司；她的法律選擇。
localize.description:
泰西卡-布朗現在正在研究起訴膠粘劑公司，指控其產品的標籤具有誤導性。

更多：https://bit.ly/3cXRvCS
